location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Captain Thomas Perronet Thompson, Commanding Agent, to James Dow, in charge of the Residency at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement from Thompson of Dow's own letter of 11 October 1820. Thompson states that he has communicated the contents of the letter to Captain Blackwood of His Majesty's sloop Curlew, who commands the ships and vessels of the Persian Gulf.
